title: Comelec to hold fair for automated election systems tech in April
desc: The Commission on Elections (Comelec) is set to hold a voters’ fair in April this year to know the latest automated election systems (AES) technologies as part of their preparations for the 2028 national elections.

title: Former ADOR CEO Min offers truce with Hybe over 25.6 billion
desc: Former ADOR chief executive Min Hee-jin on Wednesday offered to end all legal disputes with K-pop giant Hybe in return for waiving a 25.6 billion-won (US$17.89 million) put option payout she expects from the company.

title: Woolworths shares have best day on record as food sales and profit beat expectations
desc: Woolworths shares rally 13 per cent on a well-received result. The supermarket's shareholders will receive an interim dividend of 45 cents per share, up from the same time a year ago.

title: TeamGroup PD20M Mag Portable 1TB SSD Review
desc: Unfortunately, the portable SSD market is also affected by the AI-induced shortage but that didn't stop TeamGroup from sending us their latest external SSD - the TeamGroup PD20M Mag Portable SSD.

title: ArenaPlus joins Sinulog, Dinagyang in reimagining festival experiences
desc: TIKTOK Live thundering drumbeats felt bigger, louder and more electric fused with the nonstop livestreams of ArenaPlus, the country’s #1 Philippine Amusement and Gaming Corp.-licensed online sportsbook, teamed up with Spectrum, the official event organizer of “Lyvefest [powered by TikTok Live],” transformed two of the Philippines’ most iconic celebrations into immersive party spaces where culture, community, and sports digital entertainment collided in real time.

title: BRB Capital appoints Etimbuk Bassey as new CEO
desc: BRB Capital Group names Etimbuk Bassey as its new Chief Executive Officer to lead its next phase of global expansion and investment strategy in Africa.

title: Northeast US scrambles to clear piles of snow
desc: NEW YORK (AP) — Snowplows cleared the way for ambulances and fire trucks in Rhode Island. New York City workers geared up to dump massive basins of warm water...

title: YouTuber taken into custody for recording Imran Khan convoy
desc: RAWALPINDI: Law enforcement officials reportedly detained a social media activist for recording the movement of incarcerated Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf founder Imran Khan while he was being transported between a hospital and prison, The...

title: Receivers put one-seventh stake in Cheong family's Oxley Rise mansion on the block
desc: The prime freehold residential landed plot was put up for sale in 2022 at S$300 million

title: Paras Dogra headbutt sparks chaos; apology rejected as KL Rahul unleashes verbal attack in Ranji Trophy final
desc: Paras Dogra lost his cool and headbutted a Karnataka fielder amid sledging; Mayank Agarwal and KL Rahul then stepped in even as the umpire issued stern warning. | Cricket
